about_the_game:
Get ready to dive into a world of whimsy and excitement with Bunny Revenge, the captivating game that will have you on the edge of your seat!

Immerse yourself in a fantastical realm where cuddly creatures and vibrant landscapes come to life. Picture this: a delightful stuffed rabbit named Coco was meant to bring joy to a child’s life. But destiny had a different plan in store. Coco accidentally fell into the clutches of the eccentric and mischievous scientist, Dr. Fluffbottom.

Driven by insatiable curiosity and a knack for experimentation, Dr. Fluffbottom did the unimaginable. Coco was transformed into an extraordinary plush cyborg, with powers beyond your wildest dreams. Now, as the Plush Bunny Cyborg, Coco is about to embark on an epic adventure that will leave you breathless!

Equip yourself with an arsenal of high-tech gadgets and harness the incredible cybernetic enhancements bestowed upon Coco. It’s time to take action and defend the vulnerable, while restoring harmony to this whimsical world. Prepare for heart-pounding missions as you navigate through enchanting environments, encountering charming companions and facing off against formidable foes.
Unleash Coco’s extraordinary abilities to overcome challenges and solve mind-bending puzzles. Each victory brings you one step closer to discovering the truth behind Dr. Fluffbottom’s experiments. Join Coco on a mission to restore balance and bring justice to this captivating universe.

Now, here’s your call to action: add Bunny Revenge to your Steam Wishlist today! Be among the first to experience this thrilling adventure, packed with action, excitement, and an enchanting storyline. Don’t miss out on the opportunity to immerse yourself in a world of cuddly chaos and join Coco in their quest for justice.
Bunny Revenge awaits, and the whimsical world needs your help. Get ready to hop into action!

name: Bunny Revenge

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics

short_description: Immerse yourself in a fantastical realm where cuddly creatures and vibrant landscapes come to life. Join Coco on his unforgettable adventure and immerse yourself in a world where dreams and technology collide. Don’t miss out on the ultimate plushy adventure!
